entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning late in the morning. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near midnight then partly cloudy. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 25 February 2023
